meanings.definition: Give special importance or prominence to (something) in speaking or writing.
meanings.sent1: The teacher emphasizes the importance of studying for the test.
meanings.sent2: She always emphasizes the need to be kind to others.
meanings.sent3: The cat emphasizes its hunger by meowing loudly near its food bowl.
meanings.sent4: His red tie emphasizes his confidence during presentations.
meanings.sent5: The bright spotlight emphasizes the lead singer on stage.

meanings.definition: Stress or single out as important.
meanings.sent1: The coach emphasizes the value of teamwork in sports.
meanings.sent2: The article emphasizes the benefits of regular exercise.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel emphasizes the importance of storing nuts for winter by hoarding them all.
meanings.sent4: Her smile emphasizes her joy at the surprise party.
meanings.sent5: The thunder emphasizes the power of the storm approaching.
